label: cascading_failure_01_ep_029
content:
## 2024-02-12 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /checkout: REQUESTS 154800 | p50: 195ms p95: 540ms p99: 1040ms | err: 2.71% (4200 errors) | success: 97.29%
- /fraud_check: REQUESTS 154300 | p50: 170ms p95: 460ms p99: 800ms | err: 0.71% (1100 errors) | success: 99.29%
- /geo_lookup: REQUESTS 149700 | p50: 340ms p95: 680ms p99: 850ms | err: 0.41% (620 errors) | success: 99.59%
- /auth: REQUESTS 201900 | p50: 48ms p95: 124ms p99: 235ms | err: 0.16% (320 errors) | success: 99.84%
- /product_catalog: REQUESTS 272900 | p50: 63ms p95: 190ms p99: 350ms | err: 0.15% (420 errors) | success: 99.85%
- /search: REQUESTS 239600 | p50: 84ms p95: 235ms p99: 420ms | err: 0.23% (560 errors) | success: 99.77%
- /recommendations: REQUESTS 193400 | p50: 106ms p95: 300ms p99: 520ms | err: 0.27% (520 errors) | success: 99.73%

### Infrastructure
- gateway-01: CPU 69% | Mem 79% | Disk 63% | Conns: 6250 | Net: 700/850 Mbps
- gateway-02: CPU 66% | Mem 77% | Disk 62% | Conns: 6105 | Net: 682/828 Mbps
- service-b-01: CPU 70% | Mem 79% | Disk 61% | Conns: 6200 | Net: 660/770 Mbps
- metrics-db-01: CPU 46% | Mem 79% | Disk 88% | Conns: 430 | Net: 178/225 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- primary: active 190 | idle 70 | waiting 150 | exhaustion: 22 | max: 260 | avg_wait: 110ms
- replica: active 86 | idle 14 | waiting 35 | exhaustion: 8 | max: 100 | avg_wait: 32ms
- third_party_geo: active 85 | idle 35 | waiting 90 | exhaustion: 18 | max: 120 | avg_wait: 130ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 91.9% | Bandwidth: 9.1 Gbps | Origin requests: 472300

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] CONNPOOL-EXHAUSTION on gateway-01: pool=primary events=22 waiting=150
- [CRITICAL] CHECKOUT-ERROR-RATE on gateway-02: error_pct=2.71

### Deployments & Changes
- No deployments

### Events
- Feature flag 'skip-geo-on-timeout' set to 95% of traffic
- A/B test 'checkout-v2' at 15% rollout
- Vendor provided alternate geo endpoint host (DNS change prepared)
- Scaled checkout-worker pool from 12 to 14 instances

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: Shift: A. Chen. 9 pages. 3 tickets (DNS-77 geo endpoint, CO-940, POOL-689). Status: Mitigating.
